verses.kjv: Woe to them that devise iniquity, and work evil upon their beds! when the morning is light, they practise it, because it is in the power of their hand.
verses.web: Woe to those who devise iniquity and work evil on their beds! When the morning is light, they practice it, because it is in the power of their hand.
verses.ct: Disaster is coming for those who lie in bed scheming up wicked plans! The moment dawn breaks, they carry them out — simply because they have the power to do it.

verses.kjv: And they covet fields, and take them by violence; and houses, and take them away: so they oppress a man and his house, even a man and his heritage.
verses.web: They covet fields, and seize them; and houses, and take them away: and they oppress a man and his house, even a man and his heritage.
verses.ct: They see fields they want and seize them. They see houses they want and take them. They crush people, robbing families of their homes and stealing the land their ancestors left them.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, against this family do I devise an evil, from which ye shall not remove your necks; neither shall ye go haughtily: for this time is evil.
verses.web: Therefore LORD says: “Behold, I am planning against these people a disaster, from which you will not remove your necks, neither will you walk haughtily; for it is an evil time.
verses.ct: So this is what the LORD says: "Listen — I am planning a disaster against this people. You won't be able to escape it. You won't walk around so proudly anymore, because this will be a terrible time."

verses.kjv: In that day shall one take up a parable against you, and lament with a doleful lamentation, and say, We be utterly spoiled: he hath changed the portion of my people: how hath he removed it from me! turning away he hath divided our fields.
verses.web: In that day they will take up a parable against you, and lament with a doleful lamentation, saying, ‘We are utterly ruined! My people’s possession is divided up. Indeed he takes it from me and assigns our fields to traitors!’ ”
verses.ct: "When that day comes, people will mock you with a bitter song of grief: 'We are completely ruined! Our people's land has been taken away. He has stripped it from us and handed our fields over to traitors!'"

verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast a cord by lot in the congregation of the LORD.
verses.web: Therefore you will have no one who divides the land by lot in LORD’s assembly.
verses.ct: "Because of this, you will have no one left to divide land by lot in the assembly of the LORD."

verses.kjv: Prophesy ye not, say they to them that prophesy: they shall not prophesy to them, that they shall not take shame.
verses.web: “Don’t prophesy!” They prophesy. “Don’t prophesy about these things. Disgrace won’t overtake us.”
verses.ct: "Don't prophesy!" they say to the prophets. "Don't prophesy about these things — disgrace will never touch us!"

verses.kjv: O thou that art named the house of Jacob, is the spirit of the LORD straitened? are these his doings? do not my words do good to him that walketh uprightly?
verses.web: Shall it be said, O house of Jacob: “Is LORD’s Spirit angry? Are these his doings? Don’t my words do good to him who walks blamelessly?”
verses.ct: Should it really be said, house of Jacob: "Is the spirit of the LORD impatient? Is this really how he acts?" Don't my words bring good to those who live uprightly?

verses.kjv: Even of late my people is risen up as an enemy: ye pull off the robe with the garment from them that pass by securely as men averse from war.
verses.web: But lately my people have risen up as an enemy. You strip the robe and clothing from those who pass by without a care, returning from battle.
verses.ct: But lately my own people have turned into an enemy. You rip the cloak right off the backs of those passing by peacefully, people minding their own business like men returning from war.

verses.kjv: The women of my people have ye cast out from their pleasant houses; from their children have ye taken away my glory for ever.
verses.web: You drive the women of my people out from their pleasant houses; from their young children you take away my blessing forever.
verses.ct: You drive the women of my people out of the homes they love. You strip my glory from their children forever.

verses.kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.
verses.web: Arise, and depart! For this is not your resting place, because of uncleanness that destroys, even with a grievous destruction.
verses.ct: Get up and leave! This is no longer your place of rest. You have made it unclean, and it will destroy you — a devastating, total destruction.

verses.kjv: If a man walking in the spirit and falsehood do lie, saying, I will prophesy unto thee of wine and of strong drink; he shall even be the prophet of this people.
verses.web: If a man walking in a spirit of falsehood lies: “I will prophesy to you of wine and of strong drink;” he would be the prophet of this people.
verses.ct: If some liar came along, full of wind and falsehood, and said, "I'll prophesy to you about wine and strong drink!" — that's exactly the kind of prophet this people wants.

verses.kjv: I will surely assemble, O Jacob, all of thee; I will surely gather the remnant of Israel; I will put them together as the sheep of Bozrah, as the flock in the midst of their fold: they shall make great noise by reason of the multitude of men.
verses.web: I will surely assemble, Jacob, all of you; I will surely gather the remnant of Israel; I will put them together as the sheep of Bozrah, as a flock in the middle of their pasture; they will swarm with people.
verses.ct: "But I will surely gather all of you, Jacob. I will bring together the remnant of Israel. I will pack them in like sheep in Bozrah, like a flock filling its pasture — the noise of the crowd will be overwhelming."

verses.kjv: The breaker is come up before them: they have broken up, and have passed through the gate, and are gone out by it: and their king shall pass before them, and the LORD on the head of them.
verses.web: He who breaks open the way goes up before them. They break through the gate, and go out. And their king passes on before them, with LORD at their head.
verses.ct: The one who breaks open the way will go ahead of them. They will burst through the gate and pour out through it. Their king will march before them, with the LORD himself leading the way.
